Posted By: KarmasPayment (8/16/2010 7:51:32 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Absolutely stunning art for a (I dare call it) legendary card. The flavor text is heart warming, and the general "feel" of the card is incredible. Additional praise to the artist because the art blends to well with the card frame.  
  
@Combobuilder - you can buy Sol Ring on various websites or Ebay - try doing a Google search for it. The prices vary a lot from place to place, but if you want a playset (4 of them), be advised that the price tag can get pretty high. Also, keep in mind that this beautiful version of Sol Ring has (as of this post) not been released yet, so you can't find this version of Sol Ring anywhere at least until FTV: Relics is released.  
  
I really hope I can get my hands on this set for a reasonable price (the same goes to anyone else reading this, as I suspect prices to soar quickly...)  
  
Again, thanks for making this card so beautiful~
